text:
High-dose #HCQ trial #Stopped early with only one patient clearing virus with the drug. #Patients developing heart arrhythmias were being treated with a higher dose. 
#Heart arrhythmias known #sideeffect of #chloroquine - studies of malaria/autoimmune disorder patients. #covid https://t.co/aFZWM7domk https://t.co/8hSqv5okcu
